reviews: The N64 as a more affordable console from your an amazing era.
Wireless headphones with long battery life.

The Xbox Series S as a more affordable, scaled back version of the Series X, with half the storage and graphical power and lacking an optical drive. However, it retains the capability to play all the same games as the Series X and boasts fast load times
